Html: Building up to the release or Prism 4 there was lot written about what would be included and what might come later. Now that Prism 4 is out can we expect to see any more releases in the near future or is that pretty much it for now?

Hi Richard,

From the Future Plans section of this article of the Prism MSDN documentation:

"The next release of Prism is planned for the summer or fall of 2011. To provide feedback, please create and vote on work items in the CodePlex issue tracker."

You could check Karl Shifflett's blog, where you might find more information on future release plans when they're available.

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
